about_the_game:
Anomaly Corridor is a horror-themed walking simulator where the player memorizes a corridor in a spaceship during Section 0 and proceeds through the airlocks into new sections leading to an escape pod. Creatures and other weird phenomena haunt the hallway with anomalies that you must look for with the help of your flashlight to discover any anomalies that have changed the corridor. If an anomaly has been spotted, you must return to the airlock you came from to progress to the next section. Successfully make it to section 10 to board the last escape pod to survive.

Awakened from deep stasis, you find your crew dead and your ship in distress; you must get to the escape pod. To do so, you must navigate a seemingly endless corridor, uncovering eerie anomalies as you struggle to escape your doomed ship!

How to Play

  • Leave the crew quarters.
  • Study section 0 of the corridor system.
  • Look for anomalies in subsequent sections.
  • Use your flashlight to look in the darkest of corners.
  • Turn back immediately if anything is out of place.
  • Make it to section 10 to escape.

Expected Playtime

15-60 Minutes, more if you work to get all achievements.

For those who want to be a completionist, unlock all 5 Steam Achievements in the game.
detailed_description:
Anomaly Corridor is a horror-themed walking simulator where the player memorizes a corridor in a spaceship during Section 0 and proceeds through the airlocks into new sections leading to an escape pod. Creatures and other weird phenomena haunt the hallway with anomalies that you must look for with the help of your flashlight to discover any anomalies that have changed the corridor. If an anomaly has been spotted, you must return to the airlock you came from to progress to the next section. Successfully make it to section 10 to board the last escape pod to survive.

Awakened from deep stasis, you find your crew dead and your ship in distress; you must get to the escape pod. To do so, you must navigate a seemingly endless corridor, uncovering eerie anomalies as you struggle to escape your doomed ship!

How to Play

  • Leave the crew quarters.
  • Study section 0 of the corridor system.
  • Look for anomalies in subsequent sections.
  • Use your flashlight to look in the darkest of corners.
  • Turn back immediately if anything is out of place.
  • Make it to section 10 to escape.

Expected Playtime

15-60 Minutes, more if you work to get all achievements.

For those who want to be a completionist, unlock all 5 Steam Achievements in the game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS / Steam OS
  • Processor: i5 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 or similar
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system is required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS / Steam OS
  • Processor: i5-6600 3.3ghz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1080 or higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system is required

name: Anomaly Corridor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: i5 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system is required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: i5-6600 3.3ghz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1080 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system is required

short_description: Navigate a seemingly endless corridor, uncovering eerie anomalies as you struggle to escape your doomed ship!
